name: BEST WESTERN Phuket Ocean Resort

reviews.text: This is a mid priced hotel, with problems. Some of these are due to where the hotel is built, some are due to it being mid priced and can not be run very well. The stuff is VERY nice, but the following problems were still observed:
reviews.title: Mid priced hotel with problems

likes.disliked: — Low pressure shower, many steps to eleavator

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. Hotel fans out over a hill. It does have a elevator. But there are 50+ steps to and from the elevator to the room. The elevator is a vertical shaft down the middle of the hill. One needs to get to it, and more steps from it to the room.
reviews.title: Okay, but way overpriced considering other hotels in Patong / Karon

likes.liked: — Hmmm - service was good and the pool!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2. Bathroom has exposed pipes on the wall, some peeling paint, some leaking faucets. Shower pressure was ridiculously low, well below average. (Remember, cheap hotel in developing country . . . low water pressure).
reviews.title: Great location

likes.liked: — Our room was always clean, 3 pools to choose from, beautiful scenery
likes.disliked: — Didn't like being told two different prices for renting a scooter/bike

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3. One is supposed to get 2 bottles of water a day. Well, they ran out of water when they made my room, so they didn't leave any. Had to call desk in the evening, and wait for the water to be brought to the room (bottled water is a feature one pays for, not a discretionary courtesy).
reviews.title: Reasonable good value for money

likes.liked: — Good value for money and away from bustle of central Karon
likes.disliked: — Needs some updating in rooms and public areas

description: Best Western Phuket Ocean Resort is one of the best-valued vacation resorts in Phuket. The resort is situated at Karon beach on the hillside among the coconut groves overlooking Karon beach and Karon lagoon. We offer luxurious accommodations amid a lavish setting. You will truly enjoy seeing the sunset beyond Karon lagoon and walking along the beautiful fine sand beach of Karon beach. Resign yourself to the comfort of an exclusively appointed hillside resort.
